   15: -module(erl_types_SUITE).
   16: 
   17: -export([all/0,groups/0,init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   18:          consistency_and_to_string/1,misc/1,map_multiple_representations/1,
   19:          absorption/1,associativity/1,commutativity/1,idempotence/1,
   20:          identity/1,limit/1
   21:         ]).
   22: 
   23: %% Simplify calls into erl_types and avoid importing the entire module.
   24: -define(M, erl_types).
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: 
   28: all() ->
   29:     [consistency_and_to_string,
   30:      misc,
   31:      map_multiple_representations,
   32:      {group,property_tests}
   33:     ].
   34: 
   35: groups() ->
   36:     [{property_tests,[parallel],
   37:       [absorption,
   38:        associativity,
   39:        commutativity,
   40:        idempotence,
   41:        identity,
   42:        limit]}].
   43: 
   44: init_per_group(property_tests, Config0) ->
   45:     case ct_property_test:init_per_suite(Config0) of
   46:         [_|_]=Config ->
   47:             try proper_erlang_abstract_code:module() of
   48:                 _ ->
   49:                     Config
   50:             catch
   51:                 error:undef ->
   52:                     {skip, "No proper_erlang_abstract_code module"}
   53:             end;
   54:         Other ->
   55:             Other
   56:     end;
   57: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   58:     Config.
   59: 
   60: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   61:     Config.
   62: 
   63: consistency_and_to_string(_Config) ->
   64:     %% Check consistency of types
   65:     Atom1  = ?M:t_atom(),
   66:     Atom2  = ?M:t_atom(foo),
   67:     Atom3  = ?M:t_atom(bar),
   68:     true   = ?M:t_is_atom(Atom2),
   69: 
   70:     True   = ?M:t_atom(true),
   71:     False  = ?M:t_atom(false),
   72:     Bool   = ?M:t_boolean(),
   73:     true   = ?M:t_is_boolean(True),
   74:     true   = ?M:t_is_boolean(Bool),
   75:     false  = ?M:t_is_boolean(Atom1),
   76: 
   77:     Binary = ?M:t_binary(),
   78:     true   = ?M:t_is_binary(Binary),
   79: 
   80:     Bitstr = ?M:t_bitstr(),
   81:     true   = ?M:t_is_bitstr(Bitstr),
   82: 
   83:     Bitstr1 = ?M:t_bitstr(7, 3),
   84:     true   = ?M:t_is_bitstr(Bitstr1),
   85:     false  = ?M:t_is_binary(Bitstr1),
   86: 
   87:     Bitstr2 = ?M:t_bitstr(16, 8),
   88:     true   = ?M:t_is_bitstr(Bitstr2),
   89:     true   = ?M:t_is_binary(Bitstr2),
   90: 
   91:     BitStr816 = ?M:t_bitstr(8,16),
   92:     BitStr816 = ?M:t_subtract(?M:t_bitstr(4, 12), ?M:t_bitstr(8, 12)),
   93: 
   94:     Int1   = ?M:t_integer(),
   95:     Int2   = ?M:t_integer(1),
   96:     Int3   = ?M:t_integer(16#ffffffff),
   97:     true   = ?M:t_is_integer(Int2),
   98:     true   = ?M:t_is_byte(Int2),
   99:     false  = ?M:t_is_byte(Int3),
  100:     false  = ?M:t_is_byte(?M:t_from_range(-1, 1)),
  101:     true   = ?M:t_is_byte(?M:t_from_range(1, 255)),
  102: 
  103:     Tuple1 = ?M:t_tuple(),
  104:     Tuple2 = ?M:t_tuple(3),
  105:     Tuple3 = ?M:t_tuple([Atom1, Int1]),
  106:     Tuple4 = ?M:t_tuple([Tuple1, Tuple2]),
  107:     Tuple5 = ?M:t_tuple([Tuple3, Tuple4]),
  108:     Tuple6 = ?M:t_limit(Tuple5, 2),
  109:     Tuple7 = ?M:t_limit(Tuple5, 3),
  110:     true   = ?M:t_is_tuple(Tuple1),
  111: 
  112:     Port   = ?M:t_port(),
  113:     Pid    = ?M:t_pid(),
  114:     Ref    = ?M:t_reference(),
  115:     Identifier = ?M:t_identifier(),
  116:     false  = ?M:t_is_reference(Port),
  117:     true   = ?M:t_is_identifier(Port),
  118: 
  119:     Function1 = ?M:t_fun(),
  120:     Function2 = ?M:t_fun(Pid),
  121:     Function3 = ?M:t_fun([], Pid),
  122:     Function4 = ?M:t_fun([Port, Pid], Pid),
  123:     Function5 = ?M:t_fun([Pid, Atom1], Int2),
  124:     true      = ?M:t_is_fun(Function3),
  125: 
  126:     List1 = ?M:t_list(),
  127:     List2 = ?M:t_list(?M:t_boolean()),
  128:     List3 = ?M:t_cons(?M:t_boolean(), List2),
  129:     List4 = ?M:t_cons(?M:t_boolean(), ?M:t_atom()),
  130:     List5 = ?M:t_cons(?M:t_boolean(), ?M:t_nil()),
  131:     List6 = ?M:t_cons_tl(List5),
  132:     List7 = ?M:t_sup(List4, List5),
  133:     List8 = ?M:t_inf(List7, ?M:t_list()),
  134:     List9 = ?M:t_cons(),
  135:     List10 = ?M:t_cons_tl(List9),
  136:     true  = ?M:t_is_boolean(?M:t_cons_hd(List5)),
  137:     true  = ?M:t_is_list(List5),
  138:     false = ?M:t_is_list(List4),
  139: 
  140:     Product1 = ?M:t_product([Atom1, Atom2]),
  141:     Product2 = ?M:t_product([Atom3, Atom1]),
  142:     Product3 = ?M:t_product([Atom3, Atom2]),
  143: 
  144:     Union1 = ?M:t_sup(Atom2, Atom3),
  145:     Union2 = ?M:t_sup(Tuple2, Tuple3),
  146:     Union3 = ?M:t_sup(Int2, Atom3),
  147:     Union4 = ?M:t_sup(Port, Pid),
  148:     Union5 = ?M:t_sup(Union4, Int1),
  149:     Union6 = ?M:t_sup(Function1, Function2),
  150:     Union7 = ?M:t_sup(Function4, Function5),
  151:     Union8 = ?M:t_sup(True, False),
  152:     true   = ?M:t_is_boolean(Union8),
  153:     Union9 = ?M:t_sup(Int2, ?M:t_integer(2)),
  154:     true   = ?M:t_is_byte(Union9),
  155:     Union10 = ?M:t_sup(?M:t_tuple([?M:t_atom(true), ?M:t_any()]),
  156:                        ?M:t_tuple([?M:t_atom(false), ?M:t_any()])),
  157: 
  158:     Any   = ?M:t_any(),
  159:     Any   = ?M:t_sup(Product3, Function5),
  160: 
  161:     Atom3  = ?M:t_inf(Union3, Atom1),
  162:     Union2 = ?M:t_inf(Union2, Tuple1),
  163:     Int2   = ?M:t_inf(Int1, Union3),
  164:     Union4 = ?M:t_inf(Union4, Identifier),
  165:     Port   = ?M:t_inf(Union5, Port),
  166:     Function4 = ?M:t_inf(Union7, Function4),
  167:     None   = ?M:t_none(),
  168:     None   = ?M:t_inf(Product2, Atom1),
  169:     Product3 = ?M:t_inf(Product1, Product2),
  170:     Function5 = ?M:t_inf(Union7, Function5),
  171:     true   = ?M:t_is_byte(?M:t_inf(Union9, ?M:t_number())),
  172:     true   = ?M:t_is_char(?M:t_inf(Union9, ?M:t_number())),
  173: 
  174:     RecDict = #{{record, foo} => {{?FILE, ?LINE}, [{2, [{bar, [], ?M:t_any()},
  175:                                                         {baz, [], ?M:t_any()}]}]}},
  176:     Record1 = ?M:t_from_term({foo, [1,2], {1,2,3}}),
  177: 
  178:     %% Check string representations
  179:     "atom()" = ?M:t_to_string(Atom1),
  180:     "'foo'"  = ?M:t_to_string(Atom2),
  181:     "'bar'"  = ?M:t_to_string(Atom3),
  182: 
  183:     "binary()" = ?M:t_to_string(Binary),
  184: 
  185:     "integer()" = ?M:t_to_string(Int1),
  186:     "1" = ?M:t_to_string(Int2),
  187: 
  188:     "tuple()" = ?M:t_to_string(Tuple1),
  189:     "{_,_,_}" = ?M:t_to_string(Tuple2),
  190:     "{atom(),integer()}" = ?M:t_to_string(Tuple3),
  191:     "{tuple(),{_,_,_}}" = ?M:t_to_string(Tuple4),
  192:     "{{atom(),integer()},{tuple(),{_,_,_}}}" = ?M:t_to_string(Tuple5),
  193:     "{{_,_},{_,_}}" = ?M:t_to_string(Tuple6),
  194:     "{{atom(),integer()},{tuple(),{_,_,_}}}" = ?M:t_to_string(Tuple7),
  195: 
  196:     "reference()" = ?M:t_to_string(Ref),
  197:     "port()" = ?M:t_to_string(Port),
  198:     "pid()" = ?M:t_to_string(Pid),
  199:     "identifier()" = ?M:t_to_string(Identifier),
  200: 
  201:     "[any()]" = ?M:t_to_string(List1),
  202:     "[boolean()]" = ?M:t_to_string(List2),
  203:     "[boolean(),...]" = ?M:t_to_string(List3),
  204:     "nonempty_improper_list(boolean(),atom())" = ?M:t_to_string(List4),
  205:     "[boolean(),...]" = ?M:t_to_string(List5),
  206:     "[boolean()]" = ?M:t_to_string(List6),
  207:     "nonempty_maybe_improper_list(boolean(),atom() | [])" = ?M:t_to_string(List7),
  208:     "[boolean(),...]" = ?M:t_to_string(List8),
  209:     "nonempty_maybe_improper_list()" = ?M:t_to_string(List9),
  210:     "any()" = ?M:t_to_string(List10),
  211: 
  212:     "fun()" = ?M:t_to_string(Function1),
  213:     "fun((...) -> pid())" = ?M:t_to_string(Function2),
  214:     "fun(() -> pid())" = ?M:t_to_string(Function3),
  215:     "fun((port(),pid()) -> pid())" = ?M:t_to_string(Function4),
  216:     "fun((pid(),atom()) -> 1)" = ?M:t_to_string(Function5),
  217: 
  218:     "<atom(),'foo'>" = ?M:t_to_string(Product1),
  219:     "<'bar',atom()>" = ?M:t_to_string(Product2),
  220: 
  221:     "#foo{bar::[1 | 2,...],baz::{1,2,3}}" = ?M:t_to_string(Record1, RecDict),
  222: 
  223:     "'bar' | 'foo'" = ?M:t_to_string(Union1),
  224:     "{atom(),integer()} | {_,_,_}" = ?M:t_to_string(Union2),
  225:     "'bar' | 1" = ?M:t_to_string(Union3),
  226:     "pid() | port()" = ?M:t_to_string(Union4),
  227:     "pid() | port() | integer()" = ?M:t_to_string(Union5),
  228:     "fun()" = ?M:t_to_string(Union6),
  229:     "fun((pid() | port(),atom() | pid()) -> pid() | 1)" = ?M:t_to_string(Union7),
  230:     "boolean()" = ?M:t_to_string(Union8),
  231:     "{'false',_} | {'true',_}" = ?M:t_to_string(Union10),
  232:     "{'true',integer()}" = ?M:t_to_string(?M:t_inf(Union10, ?M:t_tuple([?M:t_atom(true), ?M:t_integer()]))).
  233: 
  234: misc(_Config) ->
  235:     %% Miscellaneous cases which have been fixed.
  236: 
  237:     %% Used to take "forever".
  238:     B1_1 = ?M:t_bitstr(6442450944, 1456),
  239:     B1_2 = ?M:t_bitstr(85, 7),
  240:     R1_R = ?M:t_bitstr(547608330240, 347892352432),
  241:     R1_R = ?M:t_inf(B1_1, B1_2),
  242:     ok.
  243: 
  244: %% OTP-17537.
  245: map_multiple_representations(_Config) ->
  246:     DefV = erl_types:t_atom(),
  247:     fun() ->
  248:             P2 = {erl_types:t_integer(0), optional, DefV},
  249:             Ps = [P2],
  250:             DefK = erl_types:t_pos_integer(),
  251:             T = erl_types:t_map(Ps, DefK, DefV),
  252:             "#{non_neg_integer()=>atom()}" = erl_types:t_to_string(T)
  253:     end(),
  254:     fun() ->
  255:             P1 = {erl_types:t_integer(-1), optional, DefV},
  256:             P2 = {erl_types:t_integer(0), optional, DefV},
  257:             Ps = [P1, P2],
  258:             DefK = erl_types:t_pos_integer(),
  259:             T = erl_types:t_map(Ps, DefK, DefV),
  260:             "#{integer()=>atom()}" = erl_types:t_to_string(T)
  261:     end(),
  262:     fun() ->
  263:             P1 = {erl_types:t_integer(0), optional, DefV}, % integer()
  264:             P2 = {erl_types:t_integer(1), optional, DefV}, % extra
  265:             Ps = [P1, P2],
  266:             DefK = erl_types:t_neg_integer(),
  267:             T = erl_types:t_map(Ps, DefK, DefV),
  268:             "#{integer()=>atom()}" = erl_types:t_to_string(T)
  269:     end(),
  270:     fun() ->
  271:             P1 = {erl_types:t_nil(), optional, DefV},
  272:             Ps = [P1],
  273:             DefK = erl_types:t_nonempty_list(),
  274:             T = erl_types:t_map(Ps, DefK, DefV),
  275:             "#{[any()]=>atom()}" = erl_types:t_to_string(T)
  276:     end(),
  277:     fun() ->
  278:             P1 = {erl_types:t_nil(), optional, DefV},
  279:             Ps = [P1],
  280:             DefK = erl_types:t_nonempty_string(),
  281:             T = erl_types:t_map(Ps, DefK, DefV),
  282:             "#{string()=>atom()}" = erl_types:t_to_string(T)
  283:     end(),
  284:     fun() ->
  285:             P1 = {erl_types:t_nil(), optional, DefV},
  286:             Ps = [P1],
  287:             DefK = erl_types:t_sup(erl_types:t_nonempty_string(),
  288:                                    erl_types:t_nil()),
  289:             T = erl_types:t_map(Ps, DefK, DefV),
  290:             "#{string()=>atom()}" = erl_types:t_to_string(T)
  291:     end(),
  292:     fun() ->
  293:             P1 = {erl_types:t_nil(), optional, DefV},
  294:             Ps = [P1],
  295:             DefK = erl_types:t_sup(erl_types:t_nonempty_string(),
  296:                                    erl_types:t_atom()),
  297:             T = erl_types:t_map(Ps, DefK, DefV),
  298:             "#{atom() | string()=>atom()}" = erl_types:t_to_string(T)
  299:     end(),
  300:     fun() ->
  301:             P1 = {erl_types:t_integer(0), optional, DefV},
  302:             Ps = [P1],
  303:             DefK = erl_types:t_sup(erl_types:t_pos_integer(),
  304:                                    erl_types:t_atom()),
  305:             T = erl_types:t_map(Ps, DefK, DefV),
  306:             "#{atom() | non_neg_integer()=>atom()}" = erl_types:t_to_string(T)
  307:     end(),
  308:     fun() ->
  309:             P1 = {erl_types:t_integer(8), optional, DefV},
  310:             Ps = [P1],
  311:             DefK = erl_types:t_from_range(9, 12),
  312:             T = erl_types:t_map(Ps, DefK, DefV),
  313:             "#{8 | 9 | 10 | 11 | 12=>atom()}" = erl_types:t_to_string(T)
  314: 
  315:     end(),
  316:     fun() ->
  317:             P1 = {erl_types:t_integer(13), optional, DefV},
  318:             Ps = [P1],
  319:             DefK = erl_types:t_from_range(9, 12),
  320:             T = erl_types:t_map(Ps, DefK, DefV),
  321:             "#{9 | 10 | 11 | 12 | 13=>atom()}" = erl_types:t_to_string(T)
  322: 
  323:     end(),
  324:     fun() ->
  325:             P1 = {erl_types:t_atom(a), optional, DefV},
  326:             Ps = [P1],
  327:             DefK = erl_types:t_sup([erl_types:t_atom(a01),
  328:                                     erl_types:t_atom(a02),
  329:                                     erl_types:t_atom(a03),
  330:                                     erl_types:t_atom(a04),
  331:                                     erl_types:t_atom(a05),
  332:                                     erl_types:t_atom(a06),
  333:                                     erl_types:t_atom(a07),
  334:                                     erl_types:t_atom(a08),
  335:                                     erl_types:t_atom(a09),
  336:                                     erl_types:t_atom(a10),
  337:                                     erl_types:t_atom(a11),
  338:                                     erl_types:t_atom(a12),
  339:                                     erl_types:t_atom(a13)]),
  340:             T = erl_types:t_map(Ps, DefK, DefV),
  341:             "#{atom()=>atom()}" = erl_types:t_to_string(T)
  342:     end(),
  343:     fun() ->
  344:             P1 = {erl_types:t_atom(a), optional, DefV},
  345:             Ps = [P1],
  346:             DefK = erl_types:t_sup([erl_types:t_atom(b),
  347:                                     erl_types:t_atom(c)]),
  348:             T = erl_types:t_map(Ps, DefK, DefV),
  349:             "#{'a' | 'b' | 'c'=>atom()}" = erl_types:t_to_string(T)
  350:     end(),
  351:     fun() ->
  352:             P1 = {erl_types:t_atom(a), optional, DefV},
  353:             Ps = [P1],
  354:             DefK = erl_types:t_atom(b),
  355:             T = erl_types:t_map(Ps, DefK, DefV),
  356:             "#{'a'=>atom(), 'b'=>atom()}" = erl_types:t_to_string(T)
  357:     end(),
  358:     ok.
  359: 
  360: absorption(Config) ->
  361:     %% manual test: proper:quickcheck(erl_types_prop:absorption()).
  362:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(erl_types_prop:absorption(), Config).
  363: 
  364: associativity(Config) ->
  365:     %% manual test: proper:quickcheck(erl_types_prop:associativity()).
  366:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(erl_types_prop:associativity(), Config).
  367: 
  368: commutativity(Config) ->
  369:     %% manual test: proper:quickcheck(erl_types_prop:commutativity()).
  370:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(erl_types_prop:commutativity(), Config).
  371: 
  372: idempotence(Config) ->
  373:     %% manual test: proper:quickcheck(erl_types_prop:idempotence()).
  374:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(erl_types_prop:idempotence(), Config).
  375: 
  376: identity(Config) ->
  377:     %% manual test: proper:quickcheck(erl_types_prop:identity()).
  378:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(erl_types_prop:identity(), Config).
  379: 
  380: limit(Config) ->
  381:     %% manual test: proper:quickcheck(erl_types_prop:limit()).
  382:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(erl_types_prop:limit(), Config).
